divs: Sighting DetailsThe UFO was a delta shape with what could best be explained by the old V-8 emblems on classic cars, the forward section was a V shape with a neon blue light outlining it and inside the V section was a circular shape with a castleated design in the interior portion of it with a smaller circle inside this part, this was also lit up blue like the rest of the craft. The whole experience was totally silent. I didnt feel any effects from it except that it scared the living hell out of me.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Stilwell
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: was lying in the back yard at my uncles house with cousins when delta shaped object just lit up above us and flew silently for approximately 2 miles or so then all of a sudden just went out like a light when the switch is turned off.
